The true power of self-checkout in post-pandemic grocery strategies ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> In a recent NCR consumer survey, 49% of consumers said they’ll “probably” or “definitely” use self-checkout more often.
They want to get in and get out quickly, and with as little interaction as possible. And that means self-checkout.
Are you prepared for this shift? And what about other areas of your operations—could self-service transform {{company.Company Name:default=your store}} beyond the front end?
The answer is “yes!” And you can find out more in our new self-checkout focused webinar, where you’ll see how independent grocers can use self-checkout to shape their future strategies. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
